title: Cardiovascular system pharmaceuticals in Estonia 2022 | Statista
author: Matej Mikulic; Aug
description: In 2022, the consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in Estonia increased by 21.7 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day (+4.82 percent) since 2021.
cleaned_text: Cardiovascular system pharmaceutical consumption in Estonia 2009-2022 [In 2022, the consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in Estonia increased by 21.7 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day (+4.82 percent) since 2021. With 471.5 dosages per 1,000 inhabitants per day, the consumption thereby reached its highest value in the observed period.](#statisticContainer) Find more key insights for the consumption of drugs acting on the cardiovascular system in countries like
